4x/1x acuity/1x ensorcell.
Fully unlocked Felthrop scripts - You can slap PCs and even GMs with it. This item has been fully unlocked and is Tier 4. It traps PULL, PUSH, RAISE, WAVE, LEAN, PINCH, SALUTE, POINT, POKE, SLAP. Messaging for LEAN will change based on whether you are sitting, standing, or lying down. Additionally, SALUTE, POINT, POKE, and SLAP can be targeted at a person, creature, object, yourself, or nothing! 2.5m

A Tier-3 unlocked piece of mechanical shifting jewelry. This wraithaline bracer is Tier 3 (out of a possible 4) and uses the verbs RUB to change gems and TAP to morph. Only the GEM (crystal of shadowy wraithaline) may be altered. The following gem slots are available for customization by willing merchants:

slot 1: star-shaped mistvein diamond slot 2: dragon-shaped Alhan'aht rivertear slot 3: purple black thunderhead opal slot 4: crystal of shadowy wraithaline slot 5: rune-etched golden blazestar slot 6: mitre-shaped ruby default setting: firestone - cannot be altered

You can tell that the bracer is as light as it can get. Can shift into a bracer, emblem, band, talisman, or earring. Rubbing changes the material to one of the inset gems or the firestone base. Currently is "a sigil-covered wraithaline bracer" just for example. 2m
